text: Thiesi (Tièsi) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 2,986 people lived there. Its area is 63.25 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 461 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Thiesi
